attributes.action: Support the Budget changes to age-related allowances
attributes.additional_details:
The 2012 Budget did not uprate over-65's personal allowances for 2013-2014. Get over it! New pensioners from the same date will have the same personal allowance they had the week before. Get over it!

Media distortion of the budget measures on allowances for over-65's must be counterbalanced: there is only so much money to go round. I am sick of pensioners being interviewed on the golf course, complaining of having had £80 taken from them and how they are now desperate (about where their next membership fee is coming from, presumably)!
